title: Two T206 Graded Catchers For sale (Kleinow-Bos, Bergen)

posts.post_title: Two T206 Graded Catchers For sale (Kleinow-Bos, Bergen)
posts.post_content:
Hi,

I am selling two T206 catchers, Red Kleinow(Boston) $250, and Bill Bergen $55. I prefer to be paid with a US Postal money order or check. You can contact me directly at: [url]cy@cyscards.com[/url] if you would like to buy them.

Thanks.

Cy
